spec.description: Proxmox Dashboard complete written in Flux with multiple server option for Cluster use. Original Dashboard has been taken from @mephisto and then there was modified some graphs.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpus"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg1"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg5"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "avg15"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "memtotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "swaptotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "wait"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

memused = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "memused"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

memtotal = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memory" and
    r._field == "memtotal"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["host"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {memused:memused, memtotal:memtotal},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host"]
)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_memused) / float(v:r._value_memtotal),
      host: r.host
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> last()
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["host","_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> last()
  |> limit(n:1)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> keep(columns: ["host","_value"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  r["type"] != "zfspool" 
  and r["type"] != "dir" 
  and r["type"] != "lvm" 
  and r["type"] != "lvmthin"
  and r["type"] != "btrfs"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.total),
    host: r.host
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["total","used","nodename"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "total" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  r["type"] == "zfspool" 
  or r["type"] == "dir" 
  or r["type"] == "lvm" 
  or r["type"] == "lvmthin"
  or r["type"] == "btrfs"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: r.used)/float(v: r.total),
    host: r.host
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["total","used"])

disk = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

maxdisk = from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxdisk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "lxc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(
    tables: {disk:disk, maxdisk:maxdisk},
    on: ["_time","_stop","_start","host"]

)

|> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v:r._value_disk) / float(v:r._value_maxdisk),
      host: r.host
    })
  )

|> group(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

|> group(columns: ["host"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mem")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "diskread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["object"] == "qemu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["nodename"], set: ${server:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s)
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

spec.title: Proxmox VE Cluster [Flux]_2
